column3: College of Nursing, Midwifery and Healthcare
column5: This course is designed for experienced UK registered healthcare professionals who are looking to progress within their role. You may be moving towards a role in leadership or management, or you might be a practitioner pursuing a clinical route, for example in intensive care nursing, midwifery practice, mental health nursing or addition studies. This course allows you to gain expertise in these areas.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
